name: Firework Hero
description:
Build your own firework with various colors and several types of burst !

How To Play:

- Click on the buckets to spawn a new firework.

- Drag the balls into paint bucket to change their color

- Drag the balls to the launcher

- Enjoy ! Fireworks are fired in waves every 10 seconds.

WARNING:

Don't get crazy with the Spider bursts on the web version ! They will slow down the game. Windows version is way faster if you want !

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 181. It was supposed to be a game, with goals (like following the crowd requirements and get a score from that) but I'm fine with the simulator-like result. If you missed the new year's firework, I hope you'll have fun building your own.

Sfx from freesounds.org

Happy New Year !
